name: Tile Fun
description:
Tile Fun is a brand new tile matching game! It’s not an ordinary mahjong or matching games , but will offer you a completely new game play. Match 3 same tiles to solve challenging puzzles. It’s easy at the beginning and as you progress you will face a lot challenging levels. Game always need good logic and strategy to solve levels. Once you master the skills, you will enjoy the exciting game. Tile Fun suits very well for all ages.Come experience it!

How to Play:

Tap on the squares on the tatami and place 3 identical squares on the scroll to eliminate them. After eliminating all the blocks on the field, the game wins! If there are more than 7 blocks on the scroll, the game will end.

Game Features:
-Over 1,000 levels, non-stop fun
-Rich wallpapers, switch at will
-Lucky turntable, turn out good luck
-Daily Gaming, rich gifts are free
